title: maa mahaabaaratha
sahitya:
Maa Mahaaparaatha sutham Kshamyatham thvayaa



anupallavi



Maa Mahaaparaatha sutham Maa Ganayadhavaayutham



caraNam



Thaaraatha Raakaara Dheera Koraari Samhaara

Sura neerajanaabha nirupama nirmalaanandha

Paaraavara Sri Vihaara paapadhimira bhaskara

Naaraayanatheertha Santhaara naanaagamaantha sanchaara
